Text: a lot of great music.but tell me please...how can i convert it to cd...i mean the common one.

DonÂ´t use ashampo because it will be mp3 format, then it useless because it will lose quality. Use instead Easy CD-DA Extractor to burn it as a common cd (lossless). You will need to download Flac-plugin (It's freeware)
by the way, it's not the original Glenn Miller recordings, it's remastred and applyed electric...

Try to find Ted Heath Ted orchestra - A salute to Glenn Miller, that's good quality. Sorry, but I only have it on vinyl. It seems to be hard to find on CD.
